document_data.name: Taglan's Bones
document_data.georefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20180313201211/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_010203-05.htm| title = So Saith Ed Jan â€“ Mar 2005| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Taglan's Bones''' was a large freshwater swamp on the isle of [[Thelve]] in the [[Sea of Swords]], west of the library fortress of [[Candlekeep]].
document_data.Description: Taglan's Bones was located on the western end of Thelve's northern shore. A [[quicksand]] laid at the swamp's heart, and it emptied into saltwater [[Cauldron of the Reach]].
document_data.History: The swamp was named after a pirate captain who stashed his treasure there, only to be murdered by his vengeful crew at the swamp's center.
